topic: 16. Empirical estimation models are typically based on
options: expert judgement based on past project experiences
regression models derived from historical project data
trial and error determination of the parameters and coefficients
topic_cn: 16. 经验估算模型通常基于
options_cn: 基于以往项目经验的专家判断
从历史项目数据中得出的回归模型
通过反复试验确定参数和系数
